mapper.select: select tb.*,ta.dept_id from bls_dept_script as ta left join bls_script as tb on ta.script_id = tb.script_id where ta.dept_id = #{sceneId} and tb.status > 0

select td.script_id,td.name,td.description,ta.user_id,tc.dept_id from bls_script_user as ta left join bls_user as tb on ta.user_id = tb.user_id left join bls_dept_script as tc on ta.script_id = tc.script_id left join bls_script as td on ta.script_id = td.script_id where ta.user_id = #{userId} and tc.dept_id = #{sceneId} and td.status > 0

select tb.*,tc.dept_id,tc.name as scene_name from bls_dept_script as ta left join bls_script as tb on ta.script_id = tb.script_id left join bls_dept as tc on ta.dept_id = tc.dept_id where tb.status >0 order by tb.run_times DESC,tb.update_time DESC limit #{limitCount}
